title: Yellowstone National Park: Ski and Snowshoe Services
body: Permitted Skiing and Snowshoeing Service Providers       A commercial business permit is required to guide trips in Yellowstone National Park. These are the guided skiing and snowshoe touring businesses that have permits to operate in Yellowstone National Park:  Â    A A Naturalist's World (406) 848-9458 Adventure Yellowstone, Inc. (406) 585-9041 Alta Expeditions (702) 800-3556 B Backroads (510) 527-1889 Beartooth Powder Guides (406) 838-2097 Buffalo Bus Touring Company (800) 426-7669 H Hawkridge Outfitters, LLC (406) 222-9550 L Lone Mountain Ranch (406) 995-4644 M Matthews Expeditions (406) 223-5134  Montana Alpine Guide, Inc. (406) 586-8430 N National Outdoor Leadership Schools (NOLS) (307) 332-1425 O Off the Beaten Path (406) 586-1311 R Rockin HK Outfitters (406) 333-4505 S Safari Yellowstone (406) 222-8557 SeeYellowstone.com (800) 221-1151 or (406) 646-9310 Shurr Adventures  (239) 300-3004 W The Wildland Trekking Company (800) 715-4453 Wild Bear Adventures (406) 848-9445 Wildlife Expeditions of Teton Science Schools (307) 733-2623 X Xanterra Adventures, Inc.
